description_of_this:
Supports for people with Alzheimer's disease and other dementias aged less than 65 years old, and their caregivers

Seminars, workshops and training sessions based on interests, hobbies and skills, Codes: $19.50 per day * subsidy available for eligible participants, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, Referral: Call or email * no referral required, Address: Sunnyside Campus, 247 Franklin St N, Kitchener, ON, N2A 1Y5, Location: lat: 43.4405, lon: -80.4451, Contact: phone: 519-893-8494 ext 6289, email: bgalbraith@regionofwaterloo.ca, url: www.regionofwaterloo.ca/en/health-and-wellness/dementia-services.aspx
